item.content:
SPECIFICATIONS

1. The path to be traversed will be black line on white surface. The width of the black line will be 1/2-1".The black color may not be completely uniform and there might be slight variation in color.
2. The arena may vary from ZonalCenter to Center.
3. Only at max 90 degree turns will be present.
4. There will be no discontinuities and no crossovers in the track.
5. The end of the line will be a black rectangular area indicating the end of the track.
